result.arabic_text: يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡ ذُنُوبَكُمۡ وَيُدۡخِلۡكُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ وَمَسَٰكِنَ طَيِّبَةٗ فِي جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٖۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
result.translation: 12. Moominiiney toh abteenik, Yalli sin dambitte siinih cabeleeh, jannootay guba weeqaytitte как gexxa sin culse Íe, kaadu meqe dabooqay Qadni deqsitta jannootal tanil dabqih sin heele, toh kaxxa asallam kee affaafa (limayiyya).
